timerScreen.resetAlertMsg: Do you want to reset the Timer?

editorScreen.resetAlertMsg: Do you want to reset the settings?

workoutListScreen.resetAlertMsg: Do you want to delete all images?

workoutListDetailScreen.alertPhotosPermissionMsg: To use your own images for workouts, please allow TabaTimer to access Photos on your device.
workoutListDetailScreen.alertPhotosPermissionMsgAndroid: To use your own images for workouts, go to "Settings" → "Apps & notifications" → "TabaTimer" → "Permissions" → "Storage", and allow TabaTimer to access photos on your device.
workoutListDetailScreen.alertPhotosPermissionMsgIos: To use your own images for workouts, go to "Settings" → "TabaTimer" → "Photos", and allow TabaTimer to access photos on your device.

subtitle.noUser: Sign in for upload / download settings

trackingPermission.alertMainMsg: TabaTimer needs tracking permission to sign in. If you would like to continue, go to "Settings" → "TabaTimer" on your device, and turn on "Allow Tracking".
trackingPermission.dataUsageExplainText: Tabatimer uses your name, email and your accounts id to create your personal account in our database. The data is only used for authentication.

uploadBtn.alertMainMsg: This will overwrite the settings on your account. Continue?

downloadBtn.alertMainMsg: This will overwrite the settings on your device. Continue?
